about_the_game:
Description :
The game takes place in early 1900s Ottoman-era Istanbul, unfolding a suspenseful and terrifying adventure centered around the legendary tale of the Gulyabani.

The story begins when experienced detective Halil, a member of the Istanbul Police Force, embarks on a journey to aid an elderly couple living in a mansion rumored to be plagued by supernatural occurrences. Unlike murder or theft cases, which deal with tangible crimes, Commissioner Nâzım Bey disapproves of Halil being assigned to such a "superstitious" matter. However, Halil remains steadfast in his promise and is determined to uncover the truth behind the eerie events.

As he steps into the mansion shrouded in dark secrets, Halil finds himself drawn into a whirlwind of unexplainable phenomena. Walking the fine line between reality and illusion, he must struggle to keep his wits about him while risking his life to solve the mystery hidden within the shadows.

Game Play :
In Gulyaban,' the primary goal for players is to investigate mysterious anomalies and uncover the source behind these strange events. To achieve this, players must gather clues by interacting with the environment and the characters within the game, solving cleverly designed puzzles along the way. In particular, the eerie and suspenseful moments that occur in an old mansion add extra excitement to the adventure, delivering dynamic gameplay that keeps players constantly on edge.

The game features an extensive inventory system that allows you to collect various collectible items found throughout the environment and use them to progress through puzzles. By deploying these items at the right time and in the right place, you can more easily overcome challenges and complete missions.

Moreover, Gulyabani emphasizes different perspectives during gameplay. In some missions, a third-person view is adopted, while in critical moments the game shifts to a first-person view, giving you the sensation of being right in the midst of the action. These perspective changes deepen the atmosphere and enhance the overall tension.
